title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6655.4 - Transfer of OAA funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6655.4 - Transfer of OAA funds

State Regulations

An area agency may request permission from the office to
transfer OAA funds between supportive and nutritional services. An area agency
may also request permission from the office to transfer funds between
congregate and home-delivered nutrition services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6655.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
